required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of CT-RD06 Cell Injection in Patients With Relapsed or Refractory CD19+ B-cell Hematological Malignancy
clinical_study.official_title: A Study of CT-RD06 Cell Injection in Patients With Relapsed or Refractory CD19+ B-cell Hematological Malignancy

brief_summary.textblock: A study of CT-RD06 cell injection in patients with relapsed or refractory CD19+ B-cell hematological malignancy.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a single arm, open-label, single-center study. This study is indicated for relapsed or refractory CD19+ B-cell hematological malignancy: B-ALL and B-NHL, the selections of dose levels and the number of subjects are based on clinical trials of similar foreign products. 2 groups of patients will be enrolled, 36 in each group. Primary objective is to explore the safety, main consideration is dose-related safety.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 28 days after CT-RD06 infusion
primary_outcome.description: Adverse events assessed according to NCI-CTCAE v5.0 criteria

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CT-RD06 infusion
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of treatment-emergent adverse events [Safety and Tolerability]

secondary_outcome.measure: B-cell acute lymphocytic leukemia(B-ALL), Overall response rate (ORR)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of ORR (ORR = CR + CRi ) at Month 6, 12, 18 and 24

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CT-RD06 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: From the first infusion of CT-RD06 to death or the last visit

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CT-RD06 infusion
secondary_outcome.description: From the first infusion of CT-RD06 to the occurrence of any event, including death, relapse or gene relapse, disease progression (any one occurs first), and the last visit

secondary_outcome.measure: B cell non-hodgkin's lymphoma (B-NHL), Overall response rate (ORR)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of ORR (ORR = CR + PR) per Lugano 2014 criteria
Assessment of DCR (DCR=CR+PR+SD) per Lugano 2014 criteria

arm_group.description: Dose escalation follows the standard 3+3 dose escalation design. A total of 3 dose levels are set for subjects.

intervention.description: CT-RD06 cell injection by intravenous infusion

facility.name: The First Hospital of Zhejiang Medical Colleage Zhejiang University
